label: 坏
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: The Shōsō-in contains a wide variety of tsuki, or cups. Some are bowl like, some irregular in shape, but many stand on a raised stem. Those with long stems resembling wine glasses are called takatsuki. [正倉院、高坏]
